Cody’s skin condition worsens over time, causing him pain. Sam and Ray are introduced. Sam’s love for fishing leads to a risky move that pays off for Ray’s fashion career. Cody receives special lotions that improve his skin condition.

Story:
Cody had really nice skin until he was about 8 years old. But as time went by, his skin began to peel and itch, causing him pain. He didn’t know what was wrong with him until he went to see a doctor who diagnosed him with a skin condition. Cody was then prescribed special lotions, but they didn't seem to work.

Meanwhile, Sam loved to fish. He would spend hours by the river, waiting patiently for the perfect catch. One day, while he was fishing, he saw a fish that he wanted so badly that he dived into the river after it! Sam’s risky move paid off, and he caught the fish he had been dreaming of.

Ray worked in the fashion industry and was always looking for new ideas. When he saw Sam’s fish, he was inspired. He noticed the unique pattern on the fish's skin and decided to incorporate it into his latest collection. The risk paid off, and Ray started a new trend altogether.

Back to Cody, who was still struggling with his skin condition. He tried different lotions and treatments, but nothing seemed to work. One day, he met someone who had the same condition as him and who recommended a new lotion that had helped them. Cody was hesitant at first, but he decided to give it a try. After a few weeks of using the new lotion, Cody's skin began to improve, and he felt better than ever before.

In the end, Cody’s skin was better, and Sam had caught the fish of his dreams, which had inspired Ray to create a new fashion trend. Sometimes, taking a risk can lead to unexpected rewards.
